summary: "Drive" is a 2011 American action drama film directed by Nicolas Winding Refn. It stars Ryan Gosling as a Hollywood stunt driver who also works as a getaway driver. He becomes close to his neighbor Irene (Carey Mulligan) and her son. When Irene's husband Standard (Oscar Isaac) gets out of prison, they get involved in a dangerous heist. The film was praised for its direction, cinematography, and performances, especially by Gosling and Albert Brooks. It was a commercial success, grossing over $81 million. Refn won the Best Director Award at the 2011 Cannes Film Festival.
title: Drive (2011 film)
